long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension highlights the 126 GOP representatives and 17 Attorney Generals that attempted to throw out the votes of 4 states in the 2020 election, so the seditious traitors can't hide. ðŸ™‚
